mapper.select: select * from (SELECT to_char(MONITOR_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24') time,round(avg(AQI_VALUE),0) 空气质量指数 FROM QHSJ_AQI_INFO GROUP BY MONITOR_TIME ORDER BY MONITOR_TIME DESC) where rownum <= 24 ORDER BY time

select * from (SELECT to_char(MONITOR_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') time, round(avg(AQI_VALUE),0) 空气质量指数 FROM QHSJ_AQI_INFO GROUP BY to_char(MONITOR_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY to_char(MONITOR_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') DESC) where rownum <= 15

select m.STREET_CODE, NVl(a.value, 0) 空气监测站数量 ,NVl(b.value, 0) 水质监测站数量,NVl(c.value, 0) 污染源监测站数量 from (select STREET_CODE from QHSJ_T_AIR_BASICINFO group by STREET_CODE union select STREET_CODE from QHSJ_SURF_WATER_BASICINFO group by STREET_CODE union select STREET_CODE from QHSJ_ENTERPRISE_BASICINFO group by STREET_CODE) m LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) value,STREET_CODE FROM QHSJ_T_AIR_BASICINFO GROUP BY STREET_CODE) a ON m.STREET_CODE = a.STREET_CODE LEFT JOIN (select count(*) value,STREET_CODE from QHSJ_SURF_WATER_BASICINFO group by STREET_CODE) b on m.STREET_CODE = b.STREET_CODE left join (select count(*) value, STREET_CODE from QHSJ_ENTERPRISE_BASICINFO group by STREET_CODE) c on m.STREET_CODE = c.STREET_CODE ORDER BY m.STREET_CODE
SELECT RIVER_NAME,TARGET_WATER_QUALITY1 一季度目标水质,NOW_WATER_QUALITY1 一季度水质现状 FROM QHSJ_RIVERWATER_QUALITY_YEAR WHERE "YEAR" = #{year}
SELECT RIVER_NAME,TARGET_WATER_QUALITY2 二季度目标水质,NOW_WATER_QUALITY2 二季度水质现状 FROM QHSJ_RIVERWATER_QUALITY_YEAR WHERE "YEAR" = #{year}
SELECT RIVER_NAME,TARGET_WATER_QUALITY3 三季度目标水质,NOW_WATER_QUALITY3 三季度水质现状 FROM QHSJ_RIVERWATER_QUALITY_YEAR WHERE "YEAR" = #{year}
SELECT RIVER_NAME,TARGET_WATER_QUALITY4 四季度目标水质,NOW_WATER_QUALITY4 四季度水质现状 FROM QHSJ_RIVERWATER_QUALITY_YEAR WHERE "YEAR" = #{year}

SELECT YEAR,round(avg(TARGET_WATER_QUALITY1),0) TARGET_WATER_QUALITY1,round(avg(NOW_WATER_QUALITY1),0) NOW_WATER_QUALITY1, round(avg(TARGET_WATER_QUALITY2),0) TARGET_WATER_QUALITY2,round(avg(NOW_WATER_QUALITY2),0) NOW_WATER_QUALITY2, round(avg(TARGET_WATER_QUALITY3),0) TARGET_WATER_QUALITY3,round(avg(NOW_WATER_QUALITY3),0) NOW_WATER_QUALITY3, round(avg(TARGET_WATER_QUALITY4),0) TARGET_WATER_QUALITY4,round(avg(NOW_WATER_QUALITY4),0) NOW_WATER_QUALITY4 FROM QHSJ_RIVERWATER_QUALITY_YEAR GROUP BY "YEAR" ORDER BY "YEAR"
